alert.note: Alert for Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 9:10AM EST until January 10 at 3:44AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Rough River near Dundee affecting Ohio County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rough River near Dundee. * WHEN...From this afternoon to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, County roads between Dundee and Narrows flood. At 26.0 feet, County roads near Sunnydale flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Sunday the stage was 22.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 25.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage after midnight. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued tonight.
